statements: SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, total_donations FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT program_name, total_volunteers FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY total_volunteers DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, total_donations, total_volunteers FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE total_donations > 5000 AND total_volunteers < 100;
SELECT program_name, total_donations FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE total_donations > 5000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT program_name, total_volunteers FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE program_name LIKE '%Education%' ORDER BY total_volunteers DESC
SELECT program_id, program_name, total_donations FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE total_donations BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY program_id ASC
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' OR end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM philanthropic_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM philanthropic_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM philanthropic_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM philanthropic_programs JOIN performance_metrics ON philanthropic_programs.program_id = performance_metrics.program_id WHERE metric_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM philanthropic_programs WHERE program_id = 1
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM philanthropic_programs WHERE program_id = 2
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM philanthropic_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT p.program_name, m.metric_name, m.metric_value FROM philanthropic_programs p JOIN performance_metrics m ON p.program_id = m.program_id WHERE m.metric_value > 100
SELECT program_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY program_id HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50
SELECT * FROM program_metrics;
SELECT program_name, total_donations FROM program_metrics;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program_metrics ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donor_data WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email, hours_volunteered FROM volunteer_data ORDER BY hours_volunteered DESC;
SELECT * FROM program_metrics WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, total_donations FROM program_metrics ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program_metrics WHERE total_volunteers > 50;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donor_data WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer_data WHERE hours_volunteered >= 10;
SELECT * FROM ProgramMetrics;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProgramMetrics ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, total_donations FROM ProgramMetrics WHERE total_beneficiaries > 50;
SELECT program_name, program_category, start_date, end_date FROM ProgramMetrics WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Donor JOIN ProgramParticipation ON Donor.donor_id = ProgramParticipation.beneficiary_id WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM ProgramMetrics;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_category FROM ProgramMetrics ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, total_donations FROM ProgramMetrics WHERE total_donations > 1000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC;

SELECT pm.program_id, pm.program_name, b.beneficiary_name FROM ProgramMetrics pm JOIN ProgramParticipation pp ON pm.program_id = pp.program_id JOIN Beneficiary b ON pp.beneficiary_id = b.beneficiary_id WHERE pp.donation_amount >= 5000;

SELECT pm.program_name, d.donor_name, d.total_donations FROM ProgramMetrics pm JOIN ProgramParticipation pp ON pm.program_id = pp.program_id JOIN Donor d ON pp.donation_amount = d.total_donations ORDER BY pm.program_name ASC, d.donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM program_metrics;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program_metrics WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, total_funding FROM program_metrics WHERE success_rate > 90;
SELECT grant_amount, grant_date, recipient_name FROM grant_metrics WHERE grant_id = 3;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date, donor_name FROM donation_metrics WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program_metrics;
SELECT grant_amount, grant_date, recipient_name FROM grant_metrics ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT impact_description, impact_score FROM impact_metrics WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_spent FROM volunteer_metrics WHERE hours_spent > 20 ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation_metrics WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
